Dear Professor Goodwin,
I am a PhD student and I would like to study the multiphase 
thermodynamic 
equilibrium of a Si-H-C system.
I have already studied the gas phase equlibrium of the same system 
with 
Cantera.
I would like to know if it is possible study it with the Cantera code.
Where can I find an example or the documentation about the multiphase 
equilibrium?

Thanks
Alessandro Veneroni
